Run full SPICEY pipeline: compute RETSI and GETSI, annotate regulatory elements, and link measures

Source: R/run_spicey.R
run_spicey.Rd

This function performs the complete SPICEY pipeline workflow:

  1. Computes Regulatory Element Tissue Specificity Index (RETSI) from scATAC-seq differential accessibility results.

  2. Computes Gene Expression Tissue Specificity Index (GETSI) from scRNA-seq differential expression results.

  3. Annotates regulatory elements (RE) with nearest genes.

  4. Optionally annotates RE with co-accessible target genes if link_method = "coaccessibility".

  5. Links RETSI and GETSI scores either by nearest gene or co-accessibility links.

Usage

run_spicey(
  atac = NULL,
  rna = NULL,
  link_method = NULL,
  links = NULL,
  coaccess_cutoff_override = 0.25,
  filter_promoter_distal = TRUE
)

Arguments

atac

A GRanges or data.frame convertible to GRanges containing differential accessibility results. Must include seqnames, start, end, avg_log2FC, p_val, and cell_type columns.

rna

A GRanges or data.frame convertible to GRanges containing differential expression results. Must include seqnames, start, end, avg_log2FC, p_val, and cell_type columns.

link_method

Character string specifying the linking method. One of "nearest" or "coaccessibility". If NULL (default), linking is not performed.

links

Optional. A data.frame or GRangesList of co-accessibility links. Required if link_method = "coaccessibility".

coaccess_cutoff_override

Numeric scalar. Co-accessibility score cutoff used to filter links. Default is 0.25.

filter_promoter_distal

Logical. Whether to filter links to keep only promoter-distal interactions when using co-accessibility. Default is TRUE.

Value

A list containing:

retsi

Data frame with computed RETSI scores if atac provided.

getsi

Data frame with computed GETSI scores if rna provided.

linking

Data frame linking RETSI and GETSI scores if link_method specified.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Compute GETSI only
results <- run_spicey_pipeline(rna = rna_data)

# Compute RETSI only
results <- run_spicey_pipeline(atac = atac_data)

# Compute both GETSI and RETSI without linking
results <- run_spicey_pipeline(atac = atac_data, rna = rna_data)

# Compute both and link with nearest gene method
results <- run_spicey_pipeline(atac = atac_data, rna = rna_data, link_method = "nearest")

# Compute both and link with co-accessibility method
results <- run_spicey_pipeline(
  atac = atac_data,
  rna = rna_data,
  link_method = "coaccessibility",
  links = coaccessibility_links,
  coaccess_cutoff_override = 0.3,
  filter_promoter_distal = TRUE
)
} # }
